Use technology: Utilize technology like smart clothing or wearable devices that can alert you to potential hazards and provide guidance to avoid injury.
Practice mindfulness: Cultivate mindfulness and awareness of your surroundings to anticipate potential risks and react accordingly.
Develop situational awareness: Train yourself to observe your environment and anticipate potential dangers, allowing you to take appropriate precautions.
Communicate with others: Inform friends, family, and colleagues of your situation and ask for their help in monitoring your safety.
Develop a support system: Create a support system of people who can assist you in case of emergencies or when you are unsure of how to react to a situation.
